alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Madison; Warren; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 26 at 6:55PM CDT until March 26 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN WARREN...SOUTHWESTERN YAZOO...NORTHWESTERN HINDS AND SOUTHWESTERN MADISON COUNTIES... At 655 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Redwood, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Youngton around 705 PM CDT. Phoenix around 710 PM CDT. Flora around 725 PM CDT. Little Yazoo around 730 PM CDT. Myrleville around 735 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Bentonia. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central and west central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
